More than 20,000 Britons have been brought home on 99 Government-chartered flights from 21 countries since the start of the coronavirus pandemic, the Foreign Office said.
But Foreign Secretary Dominic Raab acknowledged that "the job isn't yet done" and pledg… [+1121 chars]

articles.author: Poppy Kennedy
articles.title: Two new coronavirus cases confirmed in Hartlepool as another death recorded at town's hospital trust - Hartlepool Mail
articles.description: The number of confirmed coronavirus cases in Hartlepool has now reached 196 as another patient sadly dies after testing positive for coronavirus while being treated at Hartlepool hospital trust.
articles.content:
According to the latest statistics released on Friday, May 1 the number of cases in Hartlepool has risen by 12, from 180 to 192. 
There are now a total of 7,813 Covid-19 cases confirmed in the region a daily rise of 261.
The number of people to have died af… [+3485 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: How does contact tracing work and is my data safe? - BBC News
articles.description: Millions in the UK will soon be asked to download an app that helps to limit coronavirus spreading.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
Millions of people in the UK will soon be asked to track their movements to limit the spread of coronavirus.
